title: Anna Karenina
author: Leo Tolstoy
quote: "All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way."
details: Anna Karenina, a married aristocrat, embarks on a passionate and illicit love affair with Count Alexei Vronsky. Set in 19th-century Russia, the novel explores themes of love, morality, and societal norms while delving into the lives of various characters and their complex relationships.
